com.google.enterprise.connector.util

Class Base64ChecksumGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.enterprise.connector.util.BasicChecksumGenerator
      • com.google.enterprise.connector.util.Base64ChecksumGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChecksumGenerator

    public class Base64ChecksumGenerator
extends BasicChecksumGenerator
    An implementation of ChecksumGenerator that return Base64-encoded checksums using algorithms from java.security.MessageDigest.
    Since:
    2.8
    See Also:
    MessageDigest

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.google.enterprise.connector.util.BasicChecksumGenerator

        MD2, MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Base64ChecksumGenerator(java.lang.String algorithm)
      Constructs a Base64ChecksumGenerator that uses the specified message digest algorithm.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getChecksum(java.io.InputStream in)
      Returns a Base64 encoded representation of the message digest checksum of the input stream.

        getChecksum

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Base64ChecksumGenerator

        public Base64ChecksumGenerator(java.lang.String algorithm)
        Constructs a Base64ChecksumGenerator that uses the specified message digest algorithm. The supported algorithms are: "MD2", "MD5", "SHA-1", "SHA-256", "SHA-384", and "SHA-512"
        Parameters:
        algorithm - message digest algorithm

    • Method Detail

      • getChecksum

        public java.lang.String getChecksum(java.io.InputStream in)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a Base64 encoded representation of the message digest checksum of the input stream.
        Specified by:
        getChecksum in interface ChecksumGenerator
        Overrides:
        getChecksum in class BasicChecksumGenerator
        Parameters:
        in - input stream to create a checksum for
        Returns:
        a checksum for the bytes of in
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the input stream
